MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the LL22 postcode area of Abergele, affecting properties in Maes Rhosyn, Towyn Way West and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations being required to locate the fault. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:25pm on 22nd November 2020.
